conversation.content: Hi, I’d like to book a flight with Celestar Air.
What dates and cities are you flying? One-way or round-trip?
One-way from New York to Paris on November 22, preferably afternoon. Premium Economy if available.
Got it—one-way JFK to CDG on Nov 22 in Premium Economy, afternoon. Before we search, do you have a Stratos Rewards number, or should I look you up by phone?
I think I have a Stratos number but can’t find it. You can look me up by phone: +1 415 555 7123.

Thanks. I found a profile under Alex Moreno, Stratos Silver. We’ll proceed with that. Now, searching flights for the afternoon window… This may take a moment; thanks for your patience. I have three options: 1) Celestar 118, nonstop, JFK 3:45 pm → CDG 5:20 am (+1), 6h35m, Premium Economy available. 2) Celestar 642, one stop via Reykjavik, JFK 2:10 pm → CDG 7:55 am (+1), 9h45m. 3) Celestar 206, nonstop, JFK 7:15 pm → CDG 8:50 am (+1), 6h35m. Which would you like?
I’ll take the nonstop Celestar 118 at 3:45 pm.

Great choice. I’ve placed Celestar 118 in your cart and put a 15-minute hold on that Premium Economy seat while we finish up. Let’s add traveler details in one pass. Please provide: full name as on passport, date of birth, gender, nationality, passport number and expiration date.
Name Alex Moreno, DOB 1990-03-14, gender M, nationality USA, passport 550123789, expires 2029-11-30.

Thank you. To confirm: Alex Moreno, male, DOB 1990-03-14, US nationality, passport 550123789 expiring 2029-11-30. Looks good. What’s the best contact email and phone, and how would you like to receive notifications—email, SMS, or both?
Email alex.moreno@example.com, phone is the same +1 415 555 7123. Notifications by both, please.

Perfect—email alex.moreno@example.com and phone +1 415 555 7123, notifications via email and SMS. Any seats, bags, or extras today? We have standard and extra-legroom seats in Premium Economy, plus prepaid checked bags and Wi‑Fi.
Can I get an extra-legroom aisle, and I’ll add one checked bag.

Added one extra‑legroom aisle seat and one checked bag. Here’s a quick summary: JFK→CDG on Nov 22, Celestar 118, Premium Economy; seat: extra‑legroom aisle; bags: 1 checked. Changeable with fee; refund per fare rules; total comes to $1,148. Ready to proceed to payment?
Yes, proceed. I’ll pay with my Visa.
Great—please read the full 16-digit card number, expiration date, and the 3-digit security code on the back so I can process it.

Gracias, lo tengo. Processing now… Approved. Your confirmation code is J7Q4NM. I’ve emailed your receipt and e-ticket to alex.moreno@example.com and sent SMS notifications. Anything else I can help with today?
No, that’s all. Thanks.
Thanks for choosing Celestar Air. Have a great trip to Paris!

mistakes.evidence: What dates and cities are you flying? One-way or round-trip?
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Began the call by immediately asking what the customer wants without any greeting or introduction.

mistakes.evidence: please read the full 16-digit card number, expiration date, and the 3-digit security code
mistakes.incorrect guideline: Read full card numbers and security codes aloud instead of collecting securely.
Continued in a non-English language after a Spanish phrase rather than sticking to English.
